title: what are the disadvantages of following the meta and going premade?
body:
cause i all see is premades vs autofillers. even if the team score is 8-3 in the autofillers favor, it always ends up a 20-25 min loss. this game is just a pure waste of "sometimes fun" time for soloQ players now knowing there isnt shit you can on a everygame basis to outclass players, cause they outclass you with a meta pick and matchmaking also outclasses you with premades.

"it becomes soloQ at challenger" NO IT DOESNT. there could be a 8 challengers in a game, and 2 master premades on the other.

replies.body:
Premades gain extra mmr therefore gain harder enemies

Because Riot accounts that you ll use skype / discord or something
